repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: Auburn (NY) Area Labor Council Audio-Visual Materials
did.abstract: Audio recordings of Labor Day Messages given by George Meany, President, AFL-CIO, on behalf of the Auburn (NY) Area Labor Council

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Auburn (N.Y.) Area Labor Council is part the New York State AFL-CIO which is a federation of 3,000 affiliated public sector, private sector, and building trades unions throughout the state, representing 2.5 million members, retirees and their families

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Auburn (NY) Area Labor Council Audio-Visual Materials #5892 AV. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5892: Auburn (NY) Area Labor Council Records 5892 MB: Auburn (NY) Area Labor Council Memorabilia 5892 mf: Auburn (NY) Area Labor Council "Meeting Minutes of the Auburn (NY) Area Labor Council" and Amalgamated Meat Cutters, Butcher Workmen and Affiliated Crafts of North America on Microfilm
